name: Gain Common and Uncommon Resource
description: Take both 1 common and 1 uncommon resource.

name: Research Tech
description: Research a tech without paying its cost.

name: Draw Tech
description: Draw one tech card and put it in your hand.

name: Build Extractor
description: You may immediately build an extractor on this planet.

name: Pickup Action Card
description: You may pick up an action card other than the Refresh card.

name: Move Ship
description: You may move one of your ships to this sector.

name: Build A Ship
description: Immediately build a small ship in this sector (if you have one unbuilt in your supply).

name: Take a Trade Action
description: You may take a trade action, making one trade only.
